channel.title: How do i place a item on the ground?
channel.description: well i got project czar people are telling the way to the member way. from edgeville.. how do i block it? with some crate or somthin

item.title: How do i place a item on the ground?
item.dc:creator: @glabay glabay
item.description:
@glabay wrote:

public void makeGlobalObject(int x, int y, int typeID, int orientation, int tileObjectType){ //Makes Global objects
		for (Player p : server.playerHandler.players){
			if(p != null){
				client person = (client)p;
			if((person.playerName != null || person.playerName != "null")){
				if(person.distanceToPoint(x, y) <= 60){
					person.createNewTileObject(x, y, typeID, orientation, tileObjectType);
				}
			}
		}
	}
	}
public void NewObjects() {
			// 0 = South  -2 = North  -1 = East  -3 = West
			//-----posX---posY--ID--Face-never change
               makeGlobalObject(2653, 9808, 61, 1, 10);//altar

			NewObjects();

that last one under case 121

Read full topic

item.title: How do i place a item on the ground?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

you can add ice chunks, you search for “makeglobalobject” (in client.java)

and you add something like:

makeGlobalObject(X, Y, ObjectID, 0, 10);//Itemname

X= Coords of x you want it at
Y= Coords of y you want it att
ObjectId= Objects id
Itemname= Its name (ex. Ice chunks)
